app.name: PAQATO Zendesk Integration
app.short_description: Integrate PAQATO services into your Zendesk workspace
app.long_description:
This app integrates PAQATO services directly into the Zendesk interface. Features include:

• PAQATO AI Agent: Automatic response suggestions for support tickets
• PAQATO Shipment History: View shipment tracking information for customer orders

**Data Disclosure:**
This app accesses and transmits the following data to PAQATO servers:
• Ticket ID and conversation content (for AI response generation)
• Requester email address (for shipment history lookup)
• Zendesk subdomain (for OAuth authentication)

Data is processed in accordance with PAQATO's privacy policy. No data is shared with third parties beyond what is necessary for the app's functionality.
app.installation_instructions:
1. Enter your PAQATO API key
2. Click 'Install'
3. Connect to Zendesk via the OAuth button

token.label: PAQATO API Key
token.helpText: Your personal API key for the PAQATO integration. https://app.paqato.com/settings/company/api-key

paqato_ai_agent_enabled.label: Enable AI response suggestions
paqato_ai_agent_enabled.helpText: Enables automatic response suggestions by the PAQATO AI Agent

paqato_shipment_history_enabled.label: Show shipment history
paqato_shipment_history_enabled.helpText: Shows the shipment history in the ticket

feature_disabled_message: Please contact your Zendesk administrator to enable features.
feature_not_licensed_message: This feature is not included in your current package.
shipment_not_licensed_message: This feature is not included in your current package.
ai_agent_not_licensed_message: This feature is not included in your current package.
ai_agent_oauth_message: Connect your Zendesk account to use the AI Agent.
api_key_invalid_message: The configured API key is invalid or expired. Please contact your Zendesk administrator.
